title: Nezurite: Nezumi Oyako to Manabu Net Literacy

alternative_titles.en: Mice Media: Lessons in Internet Literacy
alternative_titles.ja: ネズリテ ～ネズミ親子と学ぶネットリテラシー～

synopsis:
A family of mice navigate the treacherous world of online information. The father can't help but believe information he finds on his smartphone, and each time, his daughter must step in and teach him about the traps of the internet and social media. This five-minute educational comedy helps viewers learn the essentials of internet literacy through a quirky and lovable father-daughter duo.

(Source: NHK WORLD-JAPAN)
